page.title: 12Cockerham Bowling Club
page.content: The club was formed in 1905, land was rented from Crookhey Hall estate and members constructed a bowling green.In 1926 the estate was sold and the bowling green was given to the club.The green has been used continuously since opening except for the 1939-45 period.The club was reformed in 1946.Membership has gradually increased and today there are over 60 members,men and women with ages ranging from 16 - 75 years.Maintenance and improvements have been carried out by the membership including the installation of floodlights.The club has six teams playing weekly from April to September.The playing area is surrounded by boarders of shrubs and flowers and is a very pleasant place to spend a few hours relaxation.
